scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/compiler build && bun run --cwd packages/shfs build
scripts.typecheck: bun x tsc --noEmit -p packages/compiler/tsconfig.json && bun x tsc --noEmit -p packages/shfs/tsconfig.json && bun x tsc --noEmit -p examples/agent/tsconfig.json && bun x tsc --noEmit -p examples/turso-agent-fs/tsconfig.json
